serviceDescription.html: Crafting responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern frameworks like React.js and Next.js, along with TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, and SCSS, focusing on clean and maintainable code.
Expert in seamlessly integrating and developing solutions with Headless CMS platforms such as Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Frontend, DatoCMS, and Drupal SiteStudio.
Building and maintaining scalable UI libraries and design systems using React Storybook, Material UI (MUI), and Styled Components to ensure consistent and reusable components.
Developing robust API integrations, consuming REST APIs, and optimizing web applications for high performance and scalability, including Server-Side Rendering (SSR) for improved load times.
